articles.author: Brett Samuels
articles.title: Trump predicts November ‘Judgment Day’ for critics in CPAC speech - The Hill
articles.description: Former President Trump on Saturday painted a bleak picture of America under President Biden’s leadership, describing himself as a “political dissident” and as the country’s last hope to address its problems. “For hard-working Americans, Nov. 5 will be our new…
